After careful consideration, we have decided to postpone our annual Fall Festival. This is not a decision that we took lightly. This would have been our 75th annual Fall Festival, and we had big plans for making this year's Fall Festival the best yet.

As important as this tradition is, the safety of our students, staff, and community is always more important. We are exploring alternative options for our Fall Festival, including postponing until CDC and state guidelines change or moving the event online.

We are open to any suggestions and would love to hear/read your thoughts! Thank you all for your continued support. #bulldogstrong

Congratulations to our National Honor Society 2019-2020 members & new inductees!

We are so, so proud of all of you! Thank you for representing our school and community so well!

To our NHS seniors: We look forward to seeing you all continue to excel and grow. We know that you all are going to continue to accomplish amazing things in this next season of life! Thank you all!

To our new inductees: You all have big shoes to fill, but you were selected by our teachers for a reason. We know that you can do it! Continue our CHS traditions, but don't be afraid to dream big and blaze new trails for your younger peers to follow and look up to.

Our varsity baseball coach, Coach Mike Garrett, has been going to the baseball field every night that we were scheduled to have a home game. Starting with the first game of the season, which should have been our seniors' last opening day as a Bulldog, he turns the scoreboard on and honors each of our seniors by displaying their number on the board.

We're so heartbroken that our seniors are missing out on so many of their senior moments, like getting to represent CHS, wear their Bulldog jerseys, and play their last season of high school sports.

Seeing our Bulldog family and our community working together to make as many memories as possible for our seniors, and the rest of our kids, is incredibly heartwarming and makes all of this a little bit easier to deal with. We are so grateful for our Bulldog family!

We are still working on ways to honor all of our seniors, ALL of them, and we hope they know how loved they are!

#bulldogstrong #weloveourseniors #thankyouseniors
